title: Honey and balsamic salad
ingredients: ['For the salad', '1 head lettuce, torn', 'Handful of spincah leaves', '10 cherry tomatoes, sliced', '1/4 red onion, thinly sliced', '175g cooked chicken breast, sliced', 'For the dressing', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon runny honey', '1 teaspoon wholegrain mustard', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
